title: The Nymphos of Rocky Flats
description: The first and only vampire book to be declassifiedby the federal government . . .Felix Gomez went to Iraq a soldier. He came back a vampire.Now he finds himself pulled into a web of intrigue when an old friend prompts him to investigate an outbreak of nymphomania at the secret government facilities in Rocky Flats. He'll find out the cause of all these horny women or die trying! But first he must contend with shadowy government agents, Eastern European vampire hunters, and women who just want his body . . .Skewering sexual myths, conspiracy fables, and government bureaucracy, "The Nymphos of Rocky Flats" reveals the bizarre world of the undead with a humorous slant and a fresh twist.
author: Mario Acevedo
